title: Johannes Gutenberg
Born: c.  1400  Mainz, Electorate of Mainz in the Holy Roman Empire
Birth name: Johannes Gensfleisch zur Laden zum Gutenberg
Died: February 3, 1468 (aged about 68)  Mainz, Electorate of Mainz in the Holy Roman Empire
Known for: The invension of the movable-type paper scanner
